txt.en: 'The plan is simple. We shall use the waste of Mordor against them. You see, this black powder is unrefined and will not explode when it comes into contact with flame. Instead, it will burn away and produce a thick haze. If we add this powder mix to the Orkish camp-fires found near the Towers of the Teeth, our movements should be masked by the haze. This will only work if we work swiftly, though. Are you with me?'
Orc fire-pits can be found around the Slag-hills.\n\nYou should add the black powder mix to Orc fire-pits to produce a smoky haze.
With the smoke rising into the air, you can now move around the Slag-hills mostly unnoticed by the Towers of the Teeth.
Add black powder mix to Orc fire-pits ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
Thurindol's plan is to produce enough smoky haze that he can move under its cover, unseen by the Towers of the Teeth.
The black powder produces a smoky haze ([placeholder]/[placeholder])
The black powder smoke now obstructs the view from the Towers of the Teeth.
